root: ^Hey there player. Ready to learn how to play.
^First off lets talk about how to move.
^Start by clicking the character you want to move.
^You should then see a button labeled MOVE, click on it!
^Some tiles will be highlighted in blue now. That's how far you can move.
^Go ahead an click on any of those tiles.
^Once you've moved all you characters click on the END TURN button to let the enemies take their turn.
